About RS_SonarCube

This website is useful for scheduling rooms. Main menu has different options for users to schedule a room and to schedule meetings or party's etc.. This website has main menu which provides options like 1.Add a room 2.Remove a room 3.List rooms 4.Schedule a room 5.Export rooms 6. Import rooms Using these options user can add room and schedule meetings to it. Select the room which he wants if it is available in the roomlist.
